009package Tools;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.addToDialog;
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.getFromDialog;
013
014import java.awt.Desktop;
015import java.nio.file.Path;
016import java.nio.file.Paths;
017
018import ij.IJ;
019import ij.ImagePlus;
020import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
021import ij.io.LogStream;
022import ij.io.SaveDialog;
023import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
024import imagingbook.core.FileUtils;
025import imagingbook.pdf.PdfExporter;
026import imagingbook.pdf.PdfExporter.Parameters;
027import imagingbook.pdf.Utils;
028
029
030/**
031 * This ImageJ plugin exports the current image and its attached
032 * vector graphic overlay (if existent) as a PDF file.
033 * It uses the free OpenPDF library, which is based on iText4 but LGPL-licensed
034 * (see <a href="https://github.com/LibrePDF/OpenPDF">
035 * https://github.com/LibrePDF/OpenPDF</a>).
036 * 
037 * @author WB
038 * @version 2021/04/05 (migrated to OpenPDF, added image properties)
039 * @version 2021/04/06 (added automatic image upscaling, open PFD after export)
040 * @version 2021/04/21 (converted from PlugInFilter to PlugIn)
041 * @version 2021/10/26 (added property insertion - TODO)
042 * @version 2022/03/14 (complete rewrite, main functionality moved to
043 * {@link PdfExporter}, fixed font embedding)
044 * @version 2022/04/23 (removed DialogListener)
045 * 
046 * TODO: fix current directory mechanism
047 * 
048 */
049public class Export_PDF implements PlugIn {
050        
051        static {
052                LogStream.redirectSystem();
053        }
054        
055        private static int MinImageWidth = 512; // used to suggest ImageUpscaleFactor
056        private static String DefaultFileExtension = ".pdf";
057        private static boolean OpenPdfAfterExport = false;
058        
059        private ImagePlus img;
060        private Parameters params;
061        
062        @Override
063        public void run(String arg) {
064                this.img = IJ.getImage();
065                if (img == null) 
066                        return;
067        
068                if (!Utils.verifyPdfLib()) {
069                        IJ.error("PDF library not found!");
070                        return;
071                }
072                
073                if (img.getStackSize() != 1) {
074                        IJ.error("Can only export single images (no stacks)!");
075                        return;
076                }
077                
078                // -------------------------------------------------
079                
080                int width = img.getWidth();
081                String filename = img.getShortTitle();
082
083                params = new Parameters();
084                params.title = img.getShortTitle();
085                params.upscaleFactor = (width >= MinImageWidth) ? 1 :
086                                        (int) Math.ceil((double)MinImageWidth / width) ;
087                params.upscaleImage = (params.upscaleFactor > 1);
088                params.includeOverlay = (img.getOverlay() != null);
089                                        
090                if (!getUserInput(params)) {
091                        return;
092                }
093                
094                if (!params.upscaleImage || params.upscaleFactor < 1) {
095                        params.upscaleFactor = 1;
096                }
097                
098                if (params.upscaleImage && params.upscaleFactor > 1) {
099                        filename = filename + "-X" + params.upscaleFactor;
100                        params.title = params.title + " (" + params.upscaleFactor + "x upscaled)";
101                }
102                
103                String directory = FileUtils.getCurrentDirectory(this.getClass());
104                if (directory == null)
105                        directory = IJ.getDirectory("image");
106                
107                Path path = askForFilePath(directory, filename, "Save as PDF");
108                if (path == null) {
109                        return;
110                }
111                
112                directory = path.getParent().toString();
113                FileUtils.setCurrentDirectory(this.getClass(), path);
114                
115                // ----------------------------------------------------------------
116                PdfExporter exporter = new PdfExporter(img, params);
117                String finalPath = exporter.exportTo(path);
118                if (finalPath == null) 
119                        IJ.error("PDF export failed to " + path.toString());
120                else
121                        IJ.log("PDF exported to " + finalPath);
122                // ----------------------------------------------------------------
123                
124                if (OpenPdfAfterExport && Desktop.isDesktopSupported()) {
125                        Desktop dt = Desktop.getDesktop();
126                        try {
127                                dt.open(path.toFile());
128                        } catch (Exception ex) {
129                                IJ.error("Could not open PDF file " + finalPath);
130                        }
131                }
132        }
133
134        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
135        
136        private boolean getUserInput(Parameters params) {
137                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Export PDF");
138                
139                addToDialog(params, gd);
140                gd.addCheckbox("Open PDF after export", OpenPdfAfterExport);
141                
142                gd.showDialog();
143                
144                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
145                        return false;
146                }
147                
148                getFromDialog(params, gd);
149                OpenPdfAfterExport = gd.getNextBoolean();
150                return params.validate();
151        }
152        
153        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
154        
155    private Path askForFilePath(String dir, String name, String title) {
156        SaveDialog od = new SaveDialog(title, dir, name, DefaultFileExtension);
157        dir  = od.getDirectory();
158        name = od.getFileName();
159        
160        if(name != null) {
161//              DefaultOutputDirectory = dir;
162                return Paths.get(dir, name);
163        }
164        else
165                return null;
166    }
167        
168        @SuppressWarnings("unused")
169        private String stripFileExtension(String fileName) {
170                int dotInd = fileName.lastIndexOf('.');
171                // if dot is in the first position,
172                // we are dealing with a hidden file rather than a DefaultFileExtension
173                return (dotInd > 0) ? fileName.substring(0, dotInd) : fileName;
174        }
175        
176}
